dict.string: Use the machine to [forge](glossary://forge) new items! All you need to do is set your inputs with `setItemA()` and `setItemB()`, then use `forgeItems()` to combine them. - callout(Example): ``` setItemA(.metal) setItemB(.dirt) forgeItems() ```
The machine needs new eyeballs. Can you help? Try combining DNA with another item and see what the machine creates.
The machine might need some metal in those eyeballs, as well.
